summary: Changes the current horse pain sounds into more bearable versions.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of hearing that loud whimper that ruptures your eardrums you hear when your horse falls off a cliff? Well this mod can help you. What it does is it replaces the current noisy and unbearable horse pain sound effects with 3 newer, enhanced, and less noisy ones.

Feel free to tell me if a sound is bothering you and I'll fix it.

[center][youtube]BISDO9fV1Z0[/youtube]

[url=http://skyrimgems.com/][img]http://skyrimgems.com/images/badge_featured_500.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: Yuatari
